Introduction

My main focuses include mobile application development for the Android platform, along with frontend and backend web development using Node.js and other related tools/frameworks. My Resume (PDF)

Skills

Android

My main specialty is mobile applications for Android in Java and Kotlin. Proficient with Android (Activity, Fragments, Intents, Lifecycle callbacks, RecyclerView, SQLite Room, Retrofit, Maps) and familiar with advanced concepts (MVVM, MVP, LiveData, Autovalues, Conductor, RxJava, Dependency Injection with Dagger 2, Butterknife)


Learn More

Web

Proficient with front-end (React, Redux, Thunks, Hooks, Axios), and back-end (Node Express, MongoDB, JWT)


Learn More

Game Development

Experience with Unity for developing games and also creating reuseable modules. Familiar with top scripting assets (Playmaker, Tween, Behavior Designer, NGUI). Experience in developing custom Game Engine using C++, DirectX, OpenGL.
